m_szDocTitle: Faraday Future, Tesla Model X, Chevy Bolt, Electric Car Sales (Cleantech Talk #17) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Faraday Future, Tesla Model X, Chevy Bolt, Electric Car Sales (Cleantech Talk #17) January 21st, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   For our 17th episode of Cleantech Talk, we got to dive into a handful of electric vehicle entrances that provided us with very mixed results. Kyle , Matthew , and I also provided our thoughts on electric car sales, which is one of my favorite topics to track, analyze, and discuss. As a reminder, you can subscribe to Cleantech Talk on iTunes and  SoundCloud . You can also download the episodes to listen to them later offline, or you can simply listen via the embedded player
